text: Thomas Fredrik Weybye Barth (22 December 1928 - 24 January 2016) was a Norwegian social anthropologist. He published several ethnographic books with a clear formalistic view. He was born in Leipzig. He was a professor in the Department of Anthropology at Boston University. He had previously been a professor at the University of Oslo, the University of Bergen, Emory University and Harvard University. He started the Department of Social Anthropology at the University of Bergen. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 1989. Barth died in Oslo, Norway on 24 January 2016 at the age of 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Los grupos étnicos y sus fronteras.
